abstract: Alfred E. Mann is betting nearly $1 billion of his own money that he can succeed where Pfizer failed.
snippet: Alfred E. Mann is betting nearly $1 billion of his own money that he can succeed where Pfizer failed.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Nov. 15 — Pfizer, the world’s biggest drug company, flopped miserably with a seemingly can’t-miss idea. But Alfred E. Mann is so certain he can succeed that he is betting nearly $1 billion of his own money on the effort.

headline.main: Betting an Estate on Inhaled Insulin
headline.print_headline: Betting an Estate on Inhaled Insulin
